1.content:
You had just transferred to another high school after things had gone raw at your first school. In all the confusion to make it quick so that you didn't collect too many absences, you had accidentally been accepted into an all-girl school.

When your first day came, the faculty were outraged. They began working to get you back into your old school, but they had to allow you to go to class until you were transferred back.

It was odd at first, being the only guy in your classes full of incredibly pretty girls your age. Seeing all of them, you realized that the best, hottest girls must have all come to this school. The rest must have ended up at your old school.

Within minutes, though, you had discovered that they were taking a field trip to a nearby candy factory. You'd found yourself squished between two girls on the ride over: a bombshell-blonde freshman named Miranda, and a sweet brunette by the name of Janesa.

You'd found out that the local factory actually made a knock-off of M&M's, called D&D's. You had been allowed to explore a little bit, but were warned very sternly not to enter a room with a "Authorized Personnel Only" sign on it. After spacing out while looking down at the D&D's candy-making machines from the platform you stood on though, your entire class seemed to have disappeared. However, there weren't any employees telling you where and where not go, either. You decided to sneak off into the dark room behind the forbidden door.

After taking only a few steps, a bright light had shined through the room from a faraway wall, blinding you completely. It seemed to pierce your body and sent an odd sensation through you until you lost consciousness.

When you woke up, you found yourself surrounded by giant D&D's candies inside of a package. It took you a minute to realize it, but you really believed that you were now shrunken and in a bag of this chocolate candy!

The thing that worried you most, though, was where you and the other future snacks were headed. Obviously, somebody had the package of D&D's, but who??
1.title: The Beginning

choices: "I can't wait to try out this new recipe!"
The sound of the bag ripping
A D&D dropping to the floor
11.content: From your prison within the bag of D&D's candy, you heard the voice of the pretty and outgoing Miranda, who'd sat beside you on the bus. You could also hear something else, and that was...
11.title: Your new blonde friend Miranda

choices: Yes, she places the pan into the oven
No, you've been saved... for now
You never even left the bowl!
111.content:
"I can't wait to try out this new recipe! My mom's going to love it when I add D&D's to it!"

You were now very worried. Were you going to be cooked alive and eaten merely as an experimental dessert for Miranda's mom? You gulped hard, hearing the bus come to a halt. Within seconds, the girls all scrambled to get out of the bus. After they got off, they all left to go home. They'd been dismissed for the day.

When Miranda got home, she kicked off her shoes and walked into the kitchen.

"Hmm..." she said to herself. "Mom won't be home 'til 5:00. I bet I can make this and still finish my homework in time to go hang out at Hanna's."

She placed the candy on the counter and pulled out pots and pans from different counters. She also gathered various ingredients, ranging from sugar to peanuts, and began melting a mixture on the stove. She poured all of the ingredients into a large bowl and when the time came, she opened the bag of candy. Her phone then began to ring, so she picked up and started talking.

"Hello? Oh, hey! Yeah, I'm still coming over. I'm just finishing up a new recipe I made. Do you think I can do my homework at your house, then?"

As she talked on the phone, she dumped the contents of the bag into the bowl and began stirring it around. She didn't even see you, because she looked up at a nearby clock as she stirred. By the time she looked into the bowl to see if it was mixed well, you were coated and hidden in melted chocolate, Rice Krispies, and peanuts.

After hanging up, Miranda began to spoon dessert into a large rectangular pan. Now came your worst moment of fear yet. Was she going to put you into the oven, where you would slowly be cooked to your death? The thought of it made you tremble...
111.title: "I can't wait to try out this new recip...

1111.content:
Miranda confirms your nightmare. She opens the oven and puts the pan inside of it. As soon as she shuts the door, you begin to feel the 350 degree temperature inside. You start to worry as well when you still can't move underneath your chocolate coating. Is this really the way you are going to end?

After a minute, your entire body is soaking in sweat. Everything is going red, plus your insides are so hot from beginning to boil that it pains you like nothing else.

Five minutes pass and Miranda checks on the dessert. She does not see anything out of the ordinary, and closes the door again.

After twenty minutes of cooking, Miranda returns to the kitchen one final time. She dons oven mitts and pulls the pan from the oven. After testing it with a toothpick, she turns off the oven and walks to the other side of the kitchen. She takes a pencil and opens up a notebook, writing:

"I made you a treat - Enjoy!

Love, Miranda"

She leaves the note by the pan and then grabs her books before heading out the door. A clock nearby shows the time as nearly 4:15.
1111.title: Yes, she places the pan into the oven

11111.content:
Shortly after 5:00, Miranda's mom returns home. She looks around, seeing only an empty house, and heads into the kitchen. She smells something good in the air, and quickly spots the pan of dessert bars. She reads the note next to the pan and smiles.

"She's so sweet."

She takes a knife from a drawer and cuts out squares. She then pulls one out and moves a crumbling half of it before it falls to the floor. She savors its taste and tries to think of all that is inside of it.

"Hmm... Tastes like peanuts, M&M's..."

She puts the rest of the bar into her mouth and chews.

"Hm! I can't tell what's in this piece! Whatever it is... it tastes good!"

Although you weren't around long enough to know, this was the last moment before your shrunken body was still intact and in one piece. You'd been cooked alive in the oven, and were now chewed to pieces between her pearly-whites. But, hey, at least you made for a pleasant snack for Miranda's mom!
11111.title: An hour later...

1112.content:
She doesn't put you into the oven, but she does something that scares you even more at this point.

Miranda takes a knife and cuts around you, then lifts the bar out and into her hand. She looks down at her creation, studying it.

You reserve some hope that she might still see you, although the chances are slim in your chocolate coating.
1112.title: No, you've been saved... for now

11121.content:
Miranda wonders why her creation has a human shape, considering it didn't have one before. Apparently, she decides to eat it-you anyway.

How does she do it?
11121.title: Miranda notices your odd, human-shape

111211.content: Miranda pops you in her mouth and chews you up into tiny crushed pieces before swallowing you. Your then digested
111211.title: she chews

111212.content: Does she do like a snake and swallows you whole?
111212.title: Other ways to be eaten.

1112121.content:
She has you on her hand and lifts it up in the air and tilts her head back.
"Down the hatch" she says. You start freaking out.
You go on her tongue and she closes her mouth. She swallows you. You digest in her round stomach. She never knew about you.
1112121.title: Down her throat

1112122.content: Does she give you to someone else?
1112122.title: Eaten by someone else?

choices: You don't even get off the chocolate treat before someone opens the fridge.
You fall off the treat, landing somewhere?
11122.content:
Her eyes scan up and down the chocolate treat. Your body is cemented still and your mouth is filled with chocolate, so all you can do is hope that she sees you.

She doesn't.

"This looks great! Now, just to let them set in the fridge for two hours, and they'll be ready!" She set the bar (and by extension, you) back down into the pan, before lifting the whole batch and setting it into the open fridge. "I can't wait to see if my mom likes them!"

The door slams shut, and the light goes out. Even coated in a layer of insulating chocolate and rice krispies, the cold is beginning to get to you. You struggle, more to keep warm than to try and break free, but to your surprise the bar, which has begun to turn brittle, starts to break. An arm comes free, and you use it to dig your body out of the dessert.

Free but exhausted, and starting to show the signs of hypothermia, you feel your eyes begin to close. "No. No. NO!." You slap yourself awake. If you fall asleep here, even if you don't freeze to death you'll be eaten. The only way to stay alive is to keep moving. And so, you do. It isn't easy to trek across the surface of the brownie bar without any light, and you stumble more than once. But quitting isn't an option, so you keep moving.
11122.title: Dessert Tundra

111221.content:
You're almost off the treat when the fridge opens again. This time it's one of Amanda's friends.
She has red hair and a ponytail. She is wearing a skirt and a blue t-shirt.
"You sure it's okay to get something?" She asks.
"Yeah it's okay" Amanda replies.
Her friend scans the freezer until she sees the chocolate bar.
"Mmm, yummy" she reaches for the bar you are on and pulls you out.
You need to jump off, but do you make it?
111221.title: Taken back out of the fridge

choices: No, instead she goes over to Miranda
Yes, and she is very surprised to see you
11122111.content: You fall and land in a soft place. You look around and notice you're in between her boobs. Does she feel you?
11122111.title: From a sweet treat to a sweet spot

1112212.content:
You trip and both you and the candy bar goes in her mouth.
She grinds the bar up, you're on her tongue having trouble standing up.
"Mm" she said."this is tasty."
You almost get chewed up.
"Gulp"
You go down her throat and into her stomach.
"So are we going to watch TV or what?"
1112212.title: Eaten by the redhead

1113.content:
Miranda stopped pouring out the mixture before you left the bowl! She pushed you, the bowl, and the spoon aside to put the pan in the oven. However, you were hardly sure that it was all over yet.

She turned on the oven and returned a few seconds later. She then picked the spoon back up and began gathering all of the leftover mixture into it, including you. Before you realized what she was doing, you saw yourself being extended into her open mouth, still stuck to the spoon. You tried hard to break away, but you were pushed onto her tongue in an instant. She began licking the mixture off the spoon, freeing you from it. Miranda walked around, enjoying the pleasant taste of her hard-earned dessert. Her soft tongue managed you around her mouth, controlling you like a puppet. She didn't chew, though. After all, she was a freshman! They never take the time to chew food. And before you knew it, she swallowed the mouthful, finalizing your fate as you were moved to her stomach.

She dropped the spoon in the sink and then left for her friend's house. As the sugar she'd eaten melted inside of her stomach, she became more hyper in her friend's company. But, maybe you had something to do with that too, because you deteriorated into her stomach acids as well. You even had the joy of feeling and seeing your body melt apart right before your very eyes until you were nothing more than the other food in Miranda's stomach.
1113.title: You never even left the bowl!

choices: Her mom interrupts her to try and help
112.content:
A hand reached in and grabbed you. When you're pulled out you see Cayla, she had long purple straight hair, big green lips and brown eyes. She put you in her pocket.
"I'm just saving it for my sleepover, you are coming right?" She said
"Sure I am" Miranda smiled. When the bus got back, school was over. They said goodbye and Cayla went home to get the sleepover started. She took you out and smiled.
"When I get done with you, Vicki will only love me." While she was preparing food, you were trying to think who Vicki was. You remembered she was sitting behind you two seats back in the classroom. You remember she had pink hair, but that is all you can remember of her. Cayla dropped you on a chocolate bar and put a marshmallow and a graham cracker. You realized what she was doing. She was about to put you in the microwave when . . .
112.title: The preparations for Cayla's party

choices: Start running along the side of the bus, avoiding danger
Take a chance and climb into Miranda's shoe
113.content:
For some reason, the D&D's bag was not well made. Probably because it was a cheaper knock-off brand from a local factory. However, the tear in the bag was made worse by the weight of the candy, so much so that it gave in within seconds. Pieces of candy went rolling everywhere after colliding on the floor. You fell, too, and found yourself rolled over by one of the wild pieces. It tossed you to the side, where you fell to a rollling stop against the side of the bus. Miranda gasped, worried that she was going to get in trouble. However, the bus soon came to a stop. You'd arrived back at the school building.

You were quick to think. You needed to do something, otherwise, you could become trapped on this bus after everyone else leaves.
113.title: The sound of the bag ripping

1132.content: You climb into her shoe and Miranda gets off tye bus and into her car. She drives home and lays in her bed and eats the rest of the D&D's happily unaware of your presence. You climb out of her shoe and up her leg. She moves over and you fall off into her pants pocket. You find a way to climb out and end up falling into her bellybutton. She gets up and goes to the kitchen and makes a sandwich. You fall into the peanut butter of her sandwich and get stuck. She smothers the other piece of bread in jelly. She then puts the other piece of bread on top of you. She then starts to eat the sandwich and the next bite is the one your in. She bites down and eats you.

You instantly wake up and notice you was in Miranda's pockets still must of passed out when you got in there.
However you start thinking of getting out and so you climb out.

'Sniff, sniff' Miranda sniffed you which caused you to be sucjed up Miranda's nose due to the strong flow of air that made its way up her nose.

"Oh Im so sorry I did not mean to inhale you. Is there anyway to make it up to you, well exept for getting you big again I cant do that but I can do anything else."
Thats when you decided you wanted her to.

choices: Climb her leg to get her attention

Run away before you DO get crushed!

Almost at the same instant that you hear a piece of candy fall through the bag, you along with the rest of the contents slip through and crash into the ground. You land down beside Miranda's shoe, while the rest of the pieces go rolling in every direction. You see Miranda's foot begin to move and instinctively grab onto her shoelace, which moves along with her foot, which would've smashed you into the floor had you not acted so quickly.

You could see now that it was going to take a lot just to stay alive. But, could you trust this Miranda girl enough to try getting her attention? Or, should you play safe and hide for now? You could also run away, if that seemed like the best option.

You decided that it was the only shoot you had at getting her attention, if you had of ran off someone might of accidentally or purposely stepped, sat, squished or even ate you. They may of kept you as a toy or a pet maybe even used you as a pet toy or pet food.

Quickly clearing your mind of all the dreaded thoughts you focused on climbing up the beautiful girl and getting her attention.

Still tightly holding her shoe lace you used it as a support to help you climb her shoes. Next came bare skin with hairs that for anyone normal sized would not see it unless they really looked at it up close, for you however, they looked like small branches.
Perfect you thought before using the hairs to climb up.

After was a very long climb you finally reach her skirt which you could simply walk on to where her shirt and skirt meets, but it feels like walking up a very long steep hill.

She looked down at you with an unamused face. She grabs you and brings you to her face.
"What are you doing on my boobs?" She asks. You try to explain, but she cuts you off. "How dare you! Do you realize what I can do to you? I should just punish you." She decides to . . .
11411.title: she noticed you and she is not happy

choices: Keep running, you can judge accurately where the footfalls will land.
Stay put and try to avoid other passerby girls.
Miranda finally stoops down to retrieve her D&Ds.
1143.content:
Instinct began to take over as you surveyed your new, macroscopic surroundings. There was certainly a stroke of luck involved in you even surviving the first fall, so you didn't intend to just wait around until Miranda had a chance to inadvertently end you beneath her titanic shoe. Brushing yourself off of D&D debris that had clung to your clothing beforehand, you look around at the candy that actually dwarfed you in size. By your own comparison estimate to the piece of candy, you were about an eighth of an inch tall... which was staggering, to put it mildly. The unlikeliness of your own durability was baffling, but you had no time to ponder on that in this sutuation. The questioning of your luck could come later, when you weren't in an extremely vulnerable position at the feet of a (relatively to stature) giantess.

Taking off like a bullet from the barrel, you begin to dash away from the blonde's looming form, still in its colossal shadow even as you weave between discarded D&D candies that are strewn at her feet. To your surprise, the girl hasn't stooped over yet to pick them up, even though it was clear she noticed them drop. To think how much you must resemble one of the pieces, and that she wouldn't have suspected in a million years that her new, currently miniaturized friend was among them. You almost feel yourself sliding as you try to adjust to the floor, which although not rough to the touch wasn't as smooth to you at your size.

It was incredible how much was revealed to you about things when you were close enough, and small enough, to witness their nuances firsthand. It was like looking through a microscope. You are jarred from your thoughts, suddenly, as a thunderous sound like some kind of high-level tremor ripped through your eardrums. Jerking your head back you realize that was merely the sound generated by an idle step from Miranda, which placed her foot just inches from where you now ran. this causes you to skid to a halt, taking in the full horror of the situation. True, you had to keep running to survive, but would the girl actually crush you unwittingly if you went ahead now? It might be better to allow Miranda to pass you now and spare you the paranoia of wondering if the next step would result in her crushing you.
1143.title: At Miranda's Feet

11432.content:
The bus comes to a stop, jerking you to the ground and sending the D&D's rolling. Everyone on the bus stands up, including Miranda, who has decided to leave the candy on the floor and hope no one notices. Before you know it, you are encased in shadow as Miranda's stark white Adidas Superstar sneaker soars above you and lands on the other side of you. You turn around to see the sneaker land with a loud THOOM, and marvel in the size of your new friend.

You stand in awe until you hear, high above you, "Oh my god, Stacy. Josh doesn't like you like that."

Oh no. In your stunned awe, you almost forgot about the other girls on the bus. You slowly turn around to see a massive Converse tennis shoe descending towards you. You quickly roll out of the way as the girl's shoe lands, and she keeps walking. But it doesn't stop there. More shoes from girls come crashing down to the ground, almost sounding like bombs landing on a battlefield. You start to panic and scream as a massive Adidas soars above you. Would you be able to survive this?
11432.title: Bombardment

11433.content:
She scoops the D&Ds and you up. She drops them in her mouth one by one. When she got to you, she dropped you in her boobs.
"Oops, well there is only one thing to do" she pushed her boobs together and crushed you.
11433.title: Miranda's crushed treat

choices: The bus pulls up at the high school
Miranda decides that she won't go along with it
Ms. Ducasse decides to take matters into her own hands.. or stomach
115.content:
"How come??" Miranda asked when she was told by Ms. Ducasse not to eat her candy.

"Because... Well, didn't anyone tell you?" her teacher responded.

"No. What?"

Ms. Ducasse knelt beside Miranda and whispered into her ear, but you could still hear her voice.

"Because we had that boy shrunken and placed into that bag."

You couldn't believe it! They knew that you were shrunken! They'd done it! But that wasn't all, either.

"We're going to give that candy to the principal, and she'll.. you know... eat him."

"What?! Why?"

"Keep quiet about it. Only a few of us know. But, it's the only way to get rid of him. Apparently, he's been expelled from enough schools that he can't get accepted anywhere else. He only got transferred here by accident."

"So you're going to kill him?"

"Don't think of it that way. He deserves this. We're just doing the punishment for the authorities."

Miranda wasn't satisfied, but she handed the bag of candy over to Ms. Ducasse. She looked out the window afterward, clearly wracked with guilt. Ms. Ducasse took the bag back to her seat and placed it into her purse. You were in complete shock at what you were hearing. You hadn't been expelled from any schools! What was going on?

However, things were far from over. This situation was definitely unusual, and you couldn't even guess what would happen in the time to come.
115.title: "Don't eat them? Why not??"

choices: Jump around inside of the bag and try to get her attention
Run as fast as you can to get out of the bag
Walk and get out of the bag
1151.content:
The bus finally arrived at the high school shortly afterward. The students all left the bus, and Ms. Ducasse waited to be the last one off. She smiled politely to the bus driver and thanked him, then headed into the school building.

Her heels clicked against the tile floor of the halls as she made her way to the offices. When she entered, a secretary greeted her.

"Hello, Valerie," the secretary said. "How was the trip?"

"Great! We even brought Amanda a souvenir from the factory," Ms. Ducasse told her, showing her the bag of D&D's.

"I'm sure she'll be pleased. She's just in her office."

Ms. Ducasse walks down past a couple open doors until she reaches the principal's office. She then greets Amanda.

"Hello! Oh, I like your curls!" Ms. Ducasse commented on the principal's blonde and brown hair, styled in curls.

"Thank you, Valerie. Did you need something?"

Ms. Ducasse places the bag of D&D's with you inside on the principal's desktop.

"The class and I brought you one of the free samples we got from the factory. It was a good trip."

"Thank you very much," Amanda responded, glancing at the package.

Ms. Ducasse leaves, and your life now hangs in the hands of Principal Amanda. She continues to work on papers for a while, but soon opens the bag at a corner, just enough to allow one candy through at a time. All is going as planned for Ms. Ducasse, but things are becoming desolate for you!
1151.title: The bus pulls up at the high school

11511.content:
You climb on top of a D&D and attempt to shake the top of the bag to get her attention. Then you hear a voice that causes you to stop.

"Principal Schaefer?" It's the secretary. "He's here."

"Mr. Moyer?" she asks. You note a strange sense of tension in her voice.

"Yes, he's right out here, ready to talk."

The secretary leaves, but the principal does not leave her desk right away. She looks around very nervously, obviously distraught. You begin shaking the bag again, but to no effect. She doesn't notice, but - worse off - she picks up the bag of candy and turns it upside down over her mouth. She pushes the D&D's - and you - down towards her minty-breathed mouth. She fills her mouth with the entire bag, including you, and stuffs all of it into one cheek. She then begins chewing very rapidly. You panic and do the best you can to not end up in her stomach. You avoid being crushed to bits, but you still find yourself swallowed as she stands up and walks across the room. You get caught in her throat amongst other unchewed morsels, which begins to choke her. She quickly pours herself a glass of water from her 5-gallon water container on the other side of the room, which she uses to swish her mouth clean and knock you loose from her throat. She then breathes easier as you're pushed into her stomach, saving her from death. You, on the other hand, could not stop the advancement of Ms. Ducasse's plan to get rid of you. Like chocolate in the mouth, you melted in the principal's stomach.
11511.title: Jump around inside of the bag and try to get he...

choices: "I don't know... Can you help me?"
11512.content:
You dash out of the bag, tripping over a D&D but successfully coming out into the open on the principal's desk. She looks down in shock, speechless at your sight.

You meet eyes with her, and you're happy just to find out that she doesn't think you're a bug. However, you're just as scared to speak as she is.

"You're... that boy!" she manages.

"Yeah."

"The one... who.. the one who transferred here!" she continues slowly. "How did you get... this way?"
11512.title: Run as fast as you can to get out of the bag

115122.content:
You explain what you know about your situation to her. She listens to you carefully, nodding with concern as you tell. When you finish, she sits back in her chair and thinks to herself for a minute. Then, she finally talks.

"I'll have a word or two with Ms. Ducasse. It seems like something's going on, and I have no idea why this is happening to you," she says before standing up from her chair.

"Thank you! Do you think there's anyway you can get me back to normal?"

The principal looks down at you without a response right away.

"I..." she begins. "We'll take all the appropriate measures to make sure that Ms. Ducasse is severely punished for doing this to you."

She walks away and leaves out the door, and you sigh.

"But, you didn't answer my question..."

Almost as soon as she leaves, the door bursts open once again and Miranda appears in the way. She quickly spots you on the desk and rushes over to you.

"Whew! I'm glad I could save you in time! Let's go!" she says quickly as she cups you inside of her soft, warm hands.

"Wait! Where are we going?" you had no idea if she was even on your side or not.

However, before she could run back through the door, the secretary woman, Valerie, appeared and blocked her way.

"Nuh uh uh! You have something that we need," she tells Miranda.

Your freshman savior turns around quickly, but finds nowhere to go. And, to make things worse, Ms. Ducasse suddenly comes barging in through a window, smashing it and sending glass everywhere, to block off the only other possible exit.

"Now then, little Miss Miranda," Ms. Ducasse says sweetly. "You have a choice... Either give him up quickly... Or..."

Valerie pulls a small, strangely-shaped gun from behind her back, aiming it at Miranda.

"Or..." Valerie adds, "you can join your little friend and enjoy the same fate as him."

Miranda looked nervously between the two women and you, feeling the pressure. It was up to her whether or not she wanted to try to save you, or give you up in order to save herself.
115122.title: "The teacher tried to..." (Explain)

choices: You've made it outside, smacking into another kid as they pass by
Ms. Ducasse's hand had stretched up and caught you
1151221.content:
Miranda's pretty eyes return to you, making your stomach flip with a sensation of joy unlike anything you'd ever felt before. You'd made a lifelong friend in this girl when you first found yourself sat beside her on the bus.

"I couldn't live with myself if I didn't try to save you," she tells you with a smile. "Maybe we'll see each other again... I really hope so."

Valerie's eyes open wide, her finger quickly moving to the trigger. However, before she can pull it, Miranda turns on her heels and throws you as hard as she can towards the open window. You find yourself sent soaring towards Ms. Ducasse, closing your eyes with a prayer to get past her before she can react. However, before you know it, you smack hard into something.

You open your eyes to find out that...
1151221.title: Miranda decides to save you

11512211.content:
You'd flown directly by Ms. Ducasse, luckily avoiding being caught or something as if she'd been a star college softball catcher. However, she was no such thing, so you'd escaped. Unfortunately, your escape did not last long before you were once again whisked off by somebody else. You'd landed down inside of someone's bookbag, falling and rolling around inside as he or she walked to their parents' car to leave school. After the person throws their bag across the back seat of the car and takes a seat, you discover who has "saved" you when your hear her voice.

"Hey, Mom. Hey, Dad," the brown-haired girl from the bus said, her voice very familiar.

"Hello, Janesa," her mom replied. "How was your day at school?"

"Good. The field trip was okay; it was kinda boring," she told them, undoing the band around her ponytail to let her hair down.

You recalled her face in your mind, her beautiful, cool-natured features with her doe-like brown eyes and pleasant, pink lips. She had a smile that had raised your stomach into your throat whenever you saw it, and her face lit up when she seemed to acknowledge the fact that she could remain cool and in control of you while you could hardly manage a word.

But, then her pretty face left your head as you remembered that you were, in fact, still in danger. Would Valerie and Ms. Ducasse really just let you go? And what had happened to Miranda, your other hot new friend? More than likely, the cruel women had kept their promise, and Miranda could be completely gone from the world at this point. But, you didn't want to think about that. Instead, you filled your mind with the last words she'd said to you.

"Maybe we'll see each other again. I really hope so."

Her pretty smile, the way she'd closed her eyes and looked happy as she said it... You would not allow yourself to believe that she'd sacrificed herself to save you.
11512211.title: You've made it outside, smacking into anoth...

choices: Uh, oh. You better try to calm her down.
115122111.content:
While inside the book bag, you see that it's filled with all sorts textbooks and notebooks and school supplies. Wanting to seek protection from the looming textbooks waiting to crush you, you seek solace in a small pencil box. After laying in there like a coffin, you decide to make the most of your situation and laid your head on a block eraser and fall asleep.

The fates wouldn't let you sleep peacefully, though. When you woke up, you were laying on the floor of the principal's office. However, you weren't quite yourself... you felt like you were being controlled by something, as if you were on some sort of autopilot or something. You took a quick glance downwards and you noticed that you really weren't yourself. You had girl parts! This blows that dream where you were running around the school naked out of the water! However, before you could think anymore about the subject, you were picked up by smooth fingers, only to look into the face of Ms. Ducasse! "She's awake, Valerie!"

"It's about time! Why didn't you just stomp her while you could?"

"Because, it's much more fun to see her reaction while she's awake. She wouldn't squirm a lot if she were still unconscious, would she?"

"I thought that was the whole point..."

"Anyways, you did a really good job at keeping that boy away from me Miranda. I should congratulate you. Was it really worth it?"

Your voice wavered as you said in Miranda's voice, "I couldn't let you hurt him. What you're doing is wrong, and you know it."

Ms. Ducasse laughed. "Oh, I know that it's wrong, but that hasn't stopped me! What's really wrong is that that bumbling buffoon is principal of this cesspool, while I spent six years on getting a Master's degree in physics just to teach bratty bimbos how to tie their own shoes! You see, she got that way purely because she was lucky, and a favorite of the superintendent, while I slaved away in college for six long years! In other words, life's not fair. Why don't you think about that as you wither away in my stomach acids?" With that, Ms. Ducasse opened her mouth and extended her tongue. You started sobbing and pleading and begging for your life, but she was still dangling you over her open mouth, eager to drop you in.

"It's still a shame that we can't get that boy. He's going to be a real thorn in your side until we find him." Valerie said, thinking aloud.

"Our side, Valerie. OUR side! You're in this too, you know. As for the boy, that's water under the bridge. It's too late to do anything about it now. Now both of you, shut up. Miranda here, is about to learn a biology lesson she'll never forget!"

You close your eyes and prepare for the worst. Instead of being coated in saliva or your body being ripped in half, you hear Valerie yell, "Wait!"

"What now?"

"I just came up with an idea to get that boy!"

Ms. Ducasse stopped dangling you over her mouth and started paying attention to Valerie. "I'm listening."

"Well, you know that boys can't resist saving the beautiful maiden, right?"

Ms. Ducasse had a look of disbelief. "You've been reading too many fairy tales lately, haven't you?"

"No, really. He'll be looking for a way to save her, or at the very least, avenge her death. Well, what if we used her as bait to lure him back here! We'll have both our witnesses and we'll have no one left to stop us."

Ms. Ducasse was pondering the idea. "Fine." She said, and tossed you to Valerie. "Keep her in your office. You've got until Friday for him to show up. After that, I want her either in your gut, or in the carpet! Ms. Ducasse then walked out of the room while Valerie has a hint of uneasiness in her face and covered you up with her other hand as the world faded into darkness.

You wake up back in the pencil box. There must have been a reason for you have gotten this dream. Most importantly, Miranda was still alive! But only until Friday. You tried to remember what day it was, and you remembered that today was Tuesday. After today, that gives you only three days for you to find Miranda and get back to normal size! Before you can start planning, the box floods with light, and a girl shrieks in terror.

A pair of glassy green eyes stare at you in the face, startled by your sudden appearance, her glossy brown hair swept low as a baseball cap hides her messy hair and she seems very young, you say the first thing that goes into your vacant mind:
"My, what lovely hair you have." Carmelia blinks, not saying anything, did you say something wrong?
"Hi," Carmelia spoke quietly, "I'm scared of bugs," At this you laugh
"I'm not some insect, Ms Ducasse wanted me to be eaten," at this Carmelia's face went wide in shock at this statement,
"Really," she breathed, "Well, I'm not going to allow her to keep you all to herself!" At this, you hoped that she would take you with her pencil case and she obliges and you are swept into the depths of her makeup and crayons.

I feel like I'm going to throw up." The teacher shooed her out while Carmelia walked into the ladies' room. She opened her case and she let you climb out.

Meanwhile, on the outside, Ms. Ducasse and Valerie were giggling to themselves, waiting for Marissa to do unwittingly do their dirty work. "Any moment now, I can hardly wait! The suspense is killing me!"

Meanwhile, you were fighting for your life inside Miranda's stomach. Luckily, there was no acid in here yet, but that could change in a moment. Your fleshy prison was shaking like an earthquake. Despite your position, you stayed optimistic. Miranda will eventually wonder where you were and when you signal where you were by kicking the stomach walls. You'll be out in no time.
11512212221.title: Surviving Miranda

115122122211.content:
Miranda wakes up on the steps of the school. "Ow, my head. What happened? Oh yeah, I was talking to the principal about something and... hmm, I don't remember." She glanced at the clocktower. "Oh my gosh, I didn't know it would be this late! I've got a whole bunch of homework!" Miranda ran home as fast as she could. She placed her book bag on the floor in her room, and immediately got started on her homework.

When she opened her textbook, she felt a strong sting under her left breast. "Ow, that was weird..." The stings kept going and at increasing frequency. "Wait, it's coming back to me... I remember a boy, and he was tiny, and Ms. Ducasse, and... oh no... she didn't, she wouldn't!" The stings in her gut indicated otherwise. "She did! Oh my god! Don't worry, I'll get you out!" Miranda scurried for the bathroom and tried to vomit. She hacked and put her finger up her throat, but nothing came out. "Rrrgh, why do the movies make this look easy?" Quickly thinking, Miranda grabbed a pack of floss and started sliding it down her throat. "Okay, new kid, if you can hear me, tug twice when you're ready for me to pull, okay? Miranda waited for a few moments when she felt the floss tug once, then twice. She slowly pulled on the floss and felt something slide up her throat. When she pulled it up, there was a tiny boy on the other end.

"Oh my gosh, are you okay?"

You cough, "Yeah, I'm okay."

"I'm so sorry, how did you even get in there?"

"Ms. Ducasse dropped me in while you were unconscious."

"That's terrible! How did you survive?"

You start swooning and you fall unconscious. The last thing you see is Miranda looking questioning at you and being placed down her shirt...
115122122211.title: Saved by Miranda

115122122212.content:
Miranda wakes up on the steps of the school. "Ow, my head. What happened? Oh yeah, I was talking to the principal about something and... hmm, I don't remember." She glanced at the clocktower. "Oh my gosh, I didn't know it would be this late! I've got a whole bunch of homework!" Miranda ran home as fast as she could. She placed her book bag on the floor in her room, and immediatley got started on her homework. She was too busy to notice your frantic pounding on her insides. She only stopped when her mother called, "Miranda, dinner's ready! We've got spaghetti!" Licking her lips, Miranda scuttled down to the kitchen. Unfortunately for you, your problems had just begun. The acid which was crawling in at a slow pace, started coming in faster. Miranda had almost completely forgot about you, until it was too late. You were nothing but a lifeless skeleton deep inside Miranda's gut.

I'd bet her x-rays for her next track physical will be really interesting...
115122122212.title: Death by Miranda

11512212222.content:
Suddenly, Miranda starts sputtering and gagging. Valerie gets a distressed look on her face. "She's choking, that's not supposed to happen!'

"Get him out of there!" Valerie starts compressing Miranda's chest and you pop out of her mouth as Ms. Ducasse nimbly catches you in midair. You struggle for a bit, but her grip is too tight. "All right, I've had enough of this, just shrink the girl, and let's finish it!" You can only watch in horror as a blue ray fires from the ray gun Valerie had and hit the incapacitated Miranda and she shrunk to your size. Ms. Ducasse had grabbed Miranda and started lifting her to her open mouth. Desperate, you bite the hand that is holding you. "Ow!" she yelled in disapprovement. In surprise, she dropped you and you fell to the floor. You looked up, and Miranda was falling like a rag-doll to the floor. You extend your arms and catch her.

"What happened?"

Ms. Ducasse examined her damaged hand. "The little prick bit me! Where'd that brat go? I'm gonna teach him a lesson he'll never forget!"

That was your cue to run. You couldn't drop Miranda, after she went through the trouble to try and save you. Sure, it failed hopelessly, but you still felt that you had to repay her. You start running, but Ms. Ducasse was bringing her foot down in front of you. You had to move one way, you could move to the left, underneath her skirt, but she may kneel down or sit on you. You could go to the right, but she might see you. You better hurry! She's putting her foot down!

You quick step left underneath Ms. Ducasse's skirt. You didn't have time to indulge yourself if you looked up, so you kept running toward the open door, while the two giantesses were frantically searching for you. You ran until your legs couldn't handle it anymore. Your problem now was to find someplace safe to hide. You crawl underneath the door to the janitor's closet and drag Miranda underneath it. Luckily, the janitor had already come, and he left the light on. In that moment, Miranda was starting to wake up. "Uggh, my head... you, did you unshrink?"

You grin sheepishly and say, "No, Ms. Ducasse, kinda shrunk you too...I'm sorry."

Miranda just sighed and rested on the mop. She started crying. You pat her back and reply, "It's all right, just let it all out..."

A tear rolls off Miranda's face and plummets to her hand, slamming you to her palm. You lay down, wondering to yourself what you'd done to deserve this fate. It all seemed so unfair, so cruel.

Miranda says nothing as she flips her hand over above Valerie's, dropping you to her hand. A smile spreads across Valerie's red lips, but Miranda only hangs her head.

"You can go now," the secretary tells Miranda. "Unless you want to see this kid die."

Miranda wipes her eyes with the back of her arm, and then she...
1151222.title: Miranda decides to save herself

11512221.content:
With your last hope of survival walking away, you feel yourself give up. You look up from the large hand of the secretary that you're within, and you only see her pleased, yet evil expression. Miranda leaves the room, closing the door behind her, and you close your eyes.

Ms. Ducasse sits down in the principal's chair, saying to Valerie, "She'll soon be finding the same fate as the principal. Go ahead and take care of the kid, I'm going to get used to my new desk."

Valerie nods and then reaches over to you with her other hand. You feel yourself plucked up between her index finger and thumb, then raised high, high above. You expect to feel yourself dropped into a wet cavern before being grinded to death, but it never comes. Instead, the two fingers compress you between them like a caught fly, slowly smashing you until your body explodes. Your life disappears in an instant, but the secretary rubs you even more until any evidence that you'd ever even lived was mashed into little pieces between her fingers.

"Well done, Valerie," Ms. Ducasse tells her as the pieces of your body fall to the floor. "It's too bad we couldn't have just had that idiot woman take care of him, but at least now we've gotten our original plans taken care of completely. Let's begin our cover-ups of their deaths. Do you remember the story? We'll blame it all on the factory."

The secretary smiles and then leaves the room, twisting her heels as she turns to walk away. Underneath her shoes, your body disappears inside the carpet.

As they pulled back into the city, Ms. Ducasse made up her mind. She quietly opened the bag and looked inside. Sure enough, you and her made eye contact, her once-beautiful hazel eyes now cold and condemning. She lifted the bag up to her face, where her cherry-tinted lips came into view. You saw her mouth open as her lips parted, revealing her smooth pink tongue and solid white teeth. Then she tilted the bag upwards, dumping the candy into her mouth until you entered it as well. She then closed her mouth and began crunching everything inside to pieces.

You were made into short work, unable to avoid her manipulative tongue and ripping teeth for very long. The sound of candy crushing filled your ears, but you soon found yourself pushed between her molars by her tongue. You saw her teeth sandwhich and tear off your arms just a second before they came around for a second chew and crushed your skull like glass.

As the bus pulled into the school parking lot, Ms. Ducasse swallowed the mass of broken particles within her mouth. She'd made sure nothing was left intact and unbroken, then smiled as you were pushed down into her stomach. She crumpled up the candy bag in her hand and tossed it in the trash, then made her way off the bus, satisfied.

14312.content:
Your sister finally nabs you, and gets a bonus with three other pieces of popcorn. She pulls you from the tub, but before she can finish you off in her mouth, the popcorn flip in her fingers and you are sent falling downwards. You and one piece of popcorn fall to her chest, where you both roll down and off into her lap. You can hear her chewing the popcorn in her mouth, but you realize you aren't safe yet.

Her hand returns, searching for her dropped snacks. She finds the piece of popcorn and led it up to its demise, the sound of which you also heard from up above. Then her hand returned again. You needed to run or hide, or you'd end up just like your former partner, Mr. Popped Corn.
14312.title: Claire's fingers pick you and three other p...

choices: Onto the seat next to Claire
Down Claire's leg, to the floor
143121.content: You decide to run, rather than risking staying on or near Claire. But your options are limited here... Where do you run?
143121.title: Run

1431211.content:
You leap like the Incredible Hulk to the next seat over, avoiding becoming your sister's snack this time around. However, just as you land, something you never predicted - but maybe should've - happens.

"Claire! We're here!" a girl nearby whispers. Behind her are three others, all the friends of Claire's that were just at the student council meeting. Unfortunately, they've came to watch the movie as well... and you're in one of their seats.

"SHH!" some nearby stiffs order the teenaged girls.

You can only turn your head up in time to look before you see your fate, which is to be sat on by Lizzie Fontaine, your sister's best friend and a very pretty, blonde-haired cheerleader. She is wearing black windpants, which completely turn out all the lights for you as she flattens you underneath her by taking your seat.

Lizzie shifts around on top of you, leaving no doubt that you've been completely squashed underneath her butt. She then becomes comfortable and digs into Claire's popcorn to watch the movie.
1431211.title: Onto the seat next to Claire

choices: Stick with Claire and take advantage of your chance
1431212.content:
You run down Claire's leg, which is angled enough that you're not just dropping off to the ground. However, when you reach her ankle, just before her black Adidas Superstar shoes, the familiar type with white stripes on the sides. Even though she is your sister, you hesitate when you realize just what you can do at this size if you're brave enough. You've always dreamed of this type of fantasy, and Claire's feet and shoes are definitely clean and fresh, being the shower-freak that she is.

But, you also realize that this decision can't be taken lightly. After all, here you are finally safe from danger, and messing around in Claire's shoe could definitely cause the end of your life.

So... What do you think your should do?
1431212.title: Down Claire's leg, to the floor

14312121.content: You want to live long enough to possibly have a chance at becoming normal-sized again, so you head away from Claire. But, which way should you go? You may be safe from your sister, but there are people and their shoes in every direction.
14312121.title: Continue running, away from Claire

choices: Go check out who the woman is
143121211.content: You go left, seeing a pair of high-heels and men's loafers. You think you recognize at least the woman's feet, so you're a bit curious to see who they belong to. However, the feet are moving around a lot, which might be dangerous. Plus, you see that, past a few empty seats, the aisle is empty. You could avoid the man and woman and just get out of the theater to safety, if you wanted.
143121211.title: Left

1431212111.content:
You go ahead and give in to your curiosity, despite the old saying that "Curiosity killed the cat."

After all, you aren't a cat!

What you see when you come into view is a bit shocking. The beautiful feet in the slick black heels are actually Ms. Ducasse's, the teacher from the field trip earlier today. She was all decked out in a red short skirt and strapless top. Her brown hair was very well-styled in ringlets and long earrings hung from her ears. She was on a date with this man, who looked to be in his late-twenties, but... they were making out.

You were kinda grossed out at the sight... After all, this was something you see teens do in theaters, not teachers or college graduates or professionals. Yet, here they were, kissing like they were ready to go at it. You shuffled around a little bit, unsure of what you should do. You supposed you could walk away and return to escaping the theater, but then you saw Ms. Ducasse's purse laying on its side nearby. You knew she was smoking hot, but you weren't sure if you should hide in her purse or not...
1431212111.title: Go check out who the woman is

choices: Find somewhere warm to spend the night in the alley behind the theater
Find something warm to eat in the restaurant near the theater
14312121111.content:
With the way that the two "kids" were going at it, you definitely decided you didn't want to join them. You steer way clear of Ms. Ducasse and then head up towards the exit, avoiding the aisle but also the seated people in the dark theater. You escape underneath the door, finding yourself out in an open lobby. It is basically empty, except for a couple of lounging employees behind the counter playing with candy by flipping it into each other's mouths and bouncing it onto their tongues from their noses. A janitor nearby is vacuuming, but he can be easily avoided. You find a safe path, out of the way of any potential dangers, but also short enough so that you can escape sometime tonight. You pass across the lobby without trouble, then you leave through the entrance doors as a few people begin to come in early. Once outside, you shiver from the cold, but run to get out of the path of the oncoming people. A young girl nearly ends your life underneath her shoe without even seeing you, but you evade it in time. At this point, you realize something. The life you've been tossed into these past few days has been just like what an ant lives with every day. You'd once been like that girl, completely unaware of the small life beneath you. You'd probably crushed more than your fair share of ants who'd been like you are now, just trying to survive, without a care.

Maybe that's why you'd been put into this situation, you thought.

However, now wasn't the ideal time to suddenly reflect on your life. Before you knew it, more people than just the little girl were threatening your entire existence as they walked over you. You avoided them carefully and dashed out to the side, away from the entrance.

Now where to go, though? You were out in the huge city at the size of an ant. It had been hard enough to get around at your normal size, but what would you do now?

You looked around, trying to get creative. There were a lot of feet and a lot of cars in the street, all of which should be avoided. However, you soon narrowed down a few good options.
14312121111.title: Escape the theater

choices: The bird's caw sounded as it flew off with a flutter
The bird shouted as it stood directly above you, wondering how to get you out
143121211111.content:
The next morning, you wake up after a very long night of shivering and trying to keep warm as you slept inside an abandoned newspaper in the alley. You'd gotten very little sleep, and your head hurt very bad when you woke up.

"Ooogh..." you moaned, crawling out of the rolled-up paper to the sound of birds.

You were quickly jolted fully-awake as you became initiated into the world of the small, the world of the prey. Before your very eyes, you saw a bird only a few feet away pluck the head of a worm from the ground and roughly tug it out. However, what sent a thick fear into your pounding heart was the sight of that unearthed worm being held up in the bird's open mouth before being downed and swallowed. In this new world, you were just like that worm. Not only did you have to fear your own fellow humans who stood as giants and giantesses above you, but now you realized that you were at the bottom of the food chain. To a bird like this one, you would be one meager meal in its stomach. It couldn't care less if you were a human or not, as long as it could eat you.

You dived back into the paper as the bird looked around for another snack. Your face was full of worry, your eyes darting from one open end of the paper to the other, hoping that you would not see the bird appear at either end, ready to stomach you.

Your heart beat hard in your chest and time seemed to move incredibly slowly. You were afraid to move either, because moving could catch the attention of the bird if it was still around. You listened closely for a while, hoping to hear a clue. Then, it came...
143121211111.title: Find somewhere warm to spend the night in the a...

choices: The bird flies off with you still in its mouth!
1431212111112.content:
The loud shriek startled you, to say the least. You nearly jumped right out of the paper hearing the bird's cry of death. However, you tried to remain calm and head still, hoping it would give up eventually. But the clever bird had no desire to do so, you soon discovered. It picked up one end of the paper with its beak, sending you tumbling to the ground. Then, it pushed aside the paper, revealing you wide open at its feet.

You looked up, frozen in fear, and turned to dash away. However, you couldn't get very far before being snapped back between the bird's beak. Then, back in front of it, the bird picks you up between its beak, tosses you into the air, and then catches you inside of its mouth. You find yourself trapped, but that's not even the worst of it!
1431212111112.title: The bird shouted as it stood directly above you...

14312121111121.content:
After being pulled back to it and tossed up into the air, the bird opened its mouth wide and watched as you dropped back down, screaming and flailing. Then, after stopping you with its tongue, the bird pushed you up to the top of its mouth and dropped you towards its throat. It swallowed you whole, with a hard tug, and sent you down inside of it.

The crazy bird seemed to be fully-aware that it was eating a human. In fact, you were almost sure that it hummed with joy as it flew off after ingesting you. It had gotten its first taste of a human, the very creature that seemed to stand at the very top of the food chain. Even though you were like a runt of the human race, the bird thought of you as a gift from the heavens for putting up with humans for so long. It would be able to return to its family later on, telling them how it had been the only one to get the chance to eat a real human. Unfortunately, that human was you.

You were pushed into its stomach as it flew off, becoming nothing more than a snack for its belly at the end of your life. Now full, the bird's stomach decided it was time to start emptying out the meal. Digestive juices poured in around you and the unlucky worm that you'd joined, and all that remained of your only existence was melted and washed away to feed this one lucky bird.

At the end of your life, you wondered it you would've preferred being your sister's snack, as you'd been given the choice to become, but today the bird would get her leftovers.
14312121111121.title: The bird swallows!

choices: An open container of Chinese food
14312121111122.content:
It takes off, flapping its wings and soaring towards the skies above the city, with you still trapped inside of its mouth. Apparently, it was saving you; or perhaps, you realized, it was planning on feeding you to its chicks. You shivered with fear at the thought of being pecked apart by baby birds eager to fill their hungry stomachs. You could already hear their starving cries as their mouths laid open wide beneath you before being dropped from their mother's mouth to theirs.

But, fate seemed to have other plans for you.

You were saved from becoming birdfeed as another bird coming around the corner of a tall building collided hard with the other, sending you flying from its mouth.

Unfortunately, this was not exactly a much better predicament.

You found yourself flipping and falling from high above, dropping down straight and fast towards the city streets where you would inevitably be splattered across the pavement.

However, as you came closer to earth, you saw something. You weren't headed to the cement sidewalks or the paved streets, but instead towards...
14312121111122.title: The bird flies off with you still in its mouth!

choices: Stay and enjoy your new home
Try to reach towards her bright red lips
143121211111221.content:
For once, things were going your way. Rather than becoming a pancake on the ground like a flying bug on a windshield, you fell through the open sun roof of a car stopped at an intersection.

Crazy enough, you also flew even farther down, dropping straight down the shirt of the beautiful woman driving. She felt you plummet into her breasts, lifting her large sunglasses from her eyes with newly-manicured fingers to get a closer look. However, she did not immediately see you squished comfortably between them and her red, lace bra. With a relaxed, cool flip of her long, lush brown hair, she decided nothing had fallen down her shirt and replaced her sunglasses on her eyes before accelerating through the open intersection.

Safe and protected from danger, you sighed and relaxed in your newfound sanctuary.
143121211111221.title: A car's open sun-roof

143121211111222.content:
A girl standing on the sidewalk, waiting to cross the street, held an open carton of Chinese food in her hand. You narrowly made it inside, avoiding the brutal splash your body would've made on the pavement if you'd been even two inches off mark. You are plunged into the food, but your entrance doesn't make enough sound to save you from the girl.

As you crawl out from underneath the rice, you hear that the girl is talking on a cell phone. However, the voice is one you recognize instantly, without even needing a hint.

You immediately realize that you've fallen from the frying pan and into the fire, now stuck inside your sister, Claire's, food.

Even worse, she doesn't even look at her food as she plucks it between her chop-sticks, phone pressed between her shoulder and ear, and plants it inside of her mouth. She continues talking on her phone as she chews her food, deep into conversation with a friend. Then, before you knew it, the moment came. Claire's fingers manipulated her chop-sticks to grab you from inside, pulling you from the carton and up towards her mouth. You saw what was coming: her wide, wet tongue approaching to welcome you inside; her shiny white teeth which would rip you apart; and the back of her mouth which loomed in the distance to send you inside of her. You were about to be eaten by your sister!
143121211111222.title: An open container of Chinese food

1431212111112221.content:
Before her pleasant mouth can take you in, your screaming pays off. The chop-sticks stop in front of her face, and Claire's eyes drop to her food to see what's going on.

To say the least, she is extremely shocked to find her own brother on the end of her chop-sticks, inches away from being fed to her.

After the initial shock is over, and Claire sits down at a nearby table with you placed on top of it, you explain the story to her. You tell her how this is the second time she's almost eaten you, about how you left the theater (leaving out the part about Ms. Ducasse), and the way you spent the freezing night in the alley before almost being devoured by a bird. Her mouth is wide open at the end of your story, and she is so surprised that she has almost no questions. However, one does come up.

"So, how do you think this happened?"

You answer, "I don't know. Something about that room in the candy factory made me this way."

"So... we need to go to that factory and figure out about that room?"

You smile, deeply grateful for having the sister you have. She does not shy away from anything, and now she shows her obvious affection and concern in wanting to help you return to normal.

"Yeah," you say. "You'll help me, then?"

"Of course!" Claire replies. "How could I return home and show you to Mom the way you are? We'll go to the factory right away!"

You thank her and then the pair of you go off to find a cab. Claire enters and sits down inside, holding you inside her hand.

"The D&D Factory north of town, please," Claire tells the driver. You can already feel your normal life returning to you. The punishment is nearly over!
1431212111112221.title: Start screaming

choices: And she hands you over to the secretary
But she doesn't give you away
14312121111122211.content:
"This is the place, huh?" Claire thinks out loud as she looks over at the factory building across the long, well-kept front lawn in front of the entrance. From the palm of her hand, you look out as well, stunned to once again see this place.

"Should we go?" you ask Claire, who seems to have fallen into a daze looking at the building. Something about this place doesn't seem right, you think to yourself. It's no ordinary factory.

Claire walks along the long path to the front door, passing by the neat green grass and large chocolate-spewing fountains behind the trim bushes that guide the walkway. The scenery is beautiful, the sky blue with only a few puffy white clouds... To someone without a grasp of the situation that you are in, they might be misled into believing that nothing is out of the ordinary here.

Claire opens the large, glass doors with an ease that had been planned in their creation. She enters a lobby with air as fresh as that which you might find on an isolated mountain. She breathed the air in deeply, pleased by it.

"Hello! How can I help you today?" a pretty, young secretary asked from behind a nearby desk. She has gum in her mouth, which she chews casually.

Claire responds with an almost dreamy-like voice.

"Um... My brother here was shrunken by something in your factory," Claire informs the secretary, showing you to her. You wonder if Claire had done the right thing by telling the secretary about the situation, but said nothing out loud.

"Oh my!" the slim, well-dressed secretary exclaims. "By something in our factory?"

"Yes."

"Well, I'll see what I can do for him," the secretary replies, holding out her open hand for you. "If you'll just give him here, please."

Claire nods, still acting dreamy...
14312121111122211.title: Half an hour later...

143121211111222111.content:
You are dropped from Claire's hand into the secretary's.

"Thank you! I'll be just a minute, if you don't mind."

The secretary turns away from Claire and enters into a room behind her. Unfortunately, the minute that the door closed, Claire realized what she might've just done. Sadly, that would be the last moment she would ever see her older brother again.

Inside the room, the secretary takes the gum from her mouth and speaks to you in a soft voice.

"It's sad that you must end this way, but we can't take the risk of returning you to normal only to sue us or go public with our secrets. So, it's necessary that rare incidents like you are taken care of personally."

You try to protest, but she covers your entire body with the piece of gum. Then, before you can try to struggle and get free, she places the gum back into her mouth. Her fresh breath greets you as you are planted inside, then her tongue pushes you across to her teeth, where she proceeds to combine you with her gum. Your body is crunched apart, stuck inside the gum, and eventually is virtually indiscernible from the gum itself.

With you still in her gum, the secretary leaves the room and returns to her desk. She smiles at Claire.

"Your brother has been taken care of. We've made sure that he has gotten the attention that he deserves, but it may be a while before you hear back from him, okay?"

Claire says nothing at first, but nods and accepts the secretary's answer. She then exits through the doors, unaware that her brother was still being chomped on by the pretty, deceptive secretary. When the door closed, she even blew a large bubble, with pieces of you blended in. Claire had turned her head, still not convinced by the secretary's words, and saw the bubble. She vaguely saw little spots upon it, but thought little of it until the secretary returned her glance and winked back with a cool smile. Claire swallowed hard as the secretary burst the bubble, but she continued walking away from the factory.

There was nothing Claire could do but pray that the secretary had meant what she said about you.
143121211111222111.title: And she hands you over to the secretary

143121211111222112.content:
Right before she nearly puts your life into the hands of this stranger, Claire pulls you back.

"Sorry," she says, her head and speech becoming clear again. "But I'll need to stay with my brother. He's been through too much."

The secretary seems a little bit hesitant about what to say.

"Okay... Well, um.. Can you come with me, then?"

Claire follows the secretary and you press down on the palm of her hand. Your sister looks down at you, and you motion that you need to tell her something. She puts you up to her ear, where you can whisper without being overheard.

"I'll warn you if something doesn't seem right," you tell her. "We have to avoid going into the room that I shrunk in, or they might try and shrink you too."

She seems surprised that you were thinking something like that.

"It's possible," you tell her.

The secretary leads Claire down a hallway before stopping in front of a door marked 'Office.'

"Please go inside," she tells Claire. "Mr. Harrington will be right with you."

You press down on your sister's hand before she opens the door and she quickly realizes the potential danger.

"You go in first, please," Claire tells the secretary. Suddenly, the control shifts into your and Claire's hands. The secretary, with her attempt to get rid of the both of you foiled, looks even more stunned than before. She stands still for a moment, trying to think of what to do, and then turns to knock on the door, pretending that someone might actually be inside.

"Hello? Mr. Harrington? Are you in there?" she asks, trying to sound convincing. "Hm.. I guess he's not in there after all."

"Listen, I don't know what you're trying to pull," Claire says strongly to the secretary. "But if you don't return my brother to normal right this instant, there's going to be a lot of trouble when I take this to the police."

The secretary finally gives up her act. With a sly smile, she replies, "You don't really think the police will believe you, do you?"

"They'll believe whatever they hear when they see a shrunken kid," Claire retorts.

You look up with a new sense of respect for your sister. She'd always been a little bit passive, tending to avoid confrontations, but now she was pushing this secretary around like a monster.

"Alright, fine," the secretary says. "Follow me. This time for real, okay?"

Claire nods and walks with the secretary again. However, you begin to notice very familiar sights. In fact, after turning a corner down the hall, you find that you and Claire have both been guided back onto the platform where, across the way and above the large candy-making machines, was the door to the room where you'd originally been shrunk. Things were about to get serious.
143121211111222112.title: But she doesn't give you away

choices: Take your chances, trust the secretary, and go into the room
1431212111112221121.content:
The very same area where you'd inadvertently traveled inside the forbidden room, which inside housed whatever magic or contraption had shrunken you to your current size. You quickly warn Claire with a press against her hand.

"This is the room!" you tell her.

She nods and looks up at it. You scan the surroundings as well, realizing now how you'd been put into the candy that was eventually nearly eaten by Claire. Just below the forbidden room was a large vat of finished D&D's candies. Whatever was inside of that room had more than likely dumped you into that vat, then proceeded to move you through the procedure which had bagged you up with the candy and then shipped you off.

"In here," the secretary began, as she pointed to the door marked 'Authorized Personnel Only,' "is where you were shrunk, right?"

She looks at you as she asks, and you nod defiantly.

"In here is also where we can return anything we've shrunken back to its normal size. It's something we try to keep secret because if the government knew we had something that could do this, it'd be taken away and our factory would more than likely be shut down, as well."

"Why do you have something that can shrink people?" Claire asks.

"Well," the secretary laughs. "We don't usually plan on having people shrunken inside there. Unfortunately, sometimes we graciously allow school field trips to come here, only to have some dumb kid who can't read trip inside and find himself shrunken."

"You didn't answer my question."

"The reason we have it is because Mr. Harrington has always had the concept for a machine that shrinks people in his head, but never had the opportunity to create such a thing."

So it's a machine, you think to yourself.

"When he first founded this factory, he could use funds to make his dream-machine, but he could use the cover-up of a candy-making factory whenever the nosy government popped in to try to regulate the place. He's been able to work on this forbidden machine for many years, but it's too advanced for the culture to accept yet. For whatever reason, people don't think having a size-changing machine would be a good thing. At least, the government doesn't."

Why is she telling us this stuff, you wonder. By doing this, you and Claire could take this to the authorities and have the company exposed.

"Well, it isn't when you use it for bad things like you've done to my brother!" Claire tells the secretary. "His life has been in danger several times because of your machine!"

"Like I said, sometimes we have visitors that are too curious for their own good," she replies. "Here, I'll return your brother back to normal, and I'll even come inside with you if it makes you feel better. But, there's one condition."

"What?"

"You can't tell anything I've told you to anyone."

You press down on Claire's hand before she speaks too soon. In these past few days, you've become wiser. There's always a catch for something that seems too good to be true. However, you need a moment to think about it. Why has this secretary who has gone from probably trying to kill off the both of them by having them enter a room by themselves suddenly decided to tell them all of the company's secrets before giving you what you want? Is she trying to help you out and also put an end to this evil company as well? Or, has she been trying to gain your and Claire's trust by telling you all of these things? After all, out of the three of them, the secretary was the one most likely to know what was in the room and how to use it to her advantage.

It would be no good if you went in only to share your fate with Claire and probably be finished off easier later. But, if you didn't go into the room with her, would you ever return to normal?
1431212111112221121.title: Continue

14312121111122211211.content:
Of all the things you've experienced so far, this one has made your head spin more than anything. However, you decide to take a chance. If you never did go back into the room, there was no guarantee things would ever get back to normal. You had to go all-in on this bet and just pray that the secretary had finally turned from her company's ways.

"Alright, we promise," Claire says on your command. "We won't tell anyone, as long as you return my brother to normal. We'll act like nothing ever happened."

You wondered if you would keep that promise if things finally went your way. After all, would you really want yet another person to fall to the same fate?

"Okay," the secretary replied with a hard gulp, obviously very nervous. "We'll definitely do all we can in court if you go against your promise. You won't beat us and we can probably get you sent off to an asylum, or worse."

The secretary seemed to have read your mind with her answer.

"Come this way," she said. "I'll go first."

You watch the door open and try to look into the dark room for any clue of a possible trap, but it's impossible to see inside. The secretary guides the way, but steps slowly, not very far in front of them. You start to wonder if this is a trap.
14312121111122211211.title: Take your chances, trust the secretary, and go ...

143121211111222112111.content:
You motion to Claire to walk inside. Claire protests silently, "Are you crazy? You said not to go in there!"

"But this is the only way I can go back to my normal size!"

"But what if it's a trap?"

"I guess we'll have to find out!"

"Are you two coming or not?" The secretary snaps back.

"Yes, but if it's a trap..."

"No, it's not. Just... trust me on this, please." Claire cautiously walked forward and entered the room. The door slammed shut behind them.

"Your bet's looking really good now."

"Shut up, Claire..."

The secretary flipped open the switch to reveal a metal box with a control panel behind some glass. The secretary pointed to a suspicious point on the floor and Claire lowered her hand to allow you to walk off. You stood in the middle of the floor panel. The secretary paused for a moment, then pushed a button. You were enveloped in a harsh blue light. When the light settled, you were the same size as Claire. Except you could see over the glass! You did it! You were your old size again!

Claire hugged you and exclaimed, "I'm so glad you're back!"

The secretary looked annoyed and opened the door, "Okay, I've fulfilled my part of the bargain, now you fulfull yours. Don't tell a soul about what happened here!"

You weren't sure if you would keep your promise after what you just went through. "Oh no, I was stuck in that bag for hours, got snatched by a bird, and almost got eaten alive by my sister, twice! If you wan't me to keep quiet, you'll have to make it worthwhile."

The secretary grunted in restrained anger. "Fine, we'll give you a month's supply of candy."

"How about a few hundred dollars?"

The secretary shut the door and said, "How about I shrink you again, and crush you beneath my foot?"

You cringed a bit. "That's okay, I'll take the candy."

The secretary opened the door and said as the two of you walked out the door, "Write your name and address down, and leave it at my desk. We'll send you a shipment." You felt relieved as you scribbled your name and address on a note pad. You left a note saying that you'll be back if you see anyone else shrunken, but you disagree. No one else would be that stupid!

============================================================================ ===================================================

"Well, this is boring. I thought a candy factory would be less..."

"Industrial?"

"Thanks, Emmy."

She looked around and sees a room that says "Authorized Personnel Only."

"Sam, weren't you listening? They said not to go in there!"

"I know, but I'm curious. Let's just see what they have in here... A quick peek."
143121211111222112111.title: Keep going...

143121211111222112112.content:
"Wait," you say. "Tell us what's in that room before we go in."

The secretary swallows hard before speaking.

"It's a short room, but there's a floor switch and a wall switch inside. When you step on the floor switch, whatever the wall switch is set to - whether that be shrink or grow - the floor switch does. So, when you stepped on it, the wall switch was set to shrink. That's why you shrank when you stepped on the floor switch. But, if I set the wall switch to grow, you can step on the floor switch and return to normal size. There isn't really any variation yet, but Mr. Harrington is working on it."

"Where are the switches at?"

The secretary points to their locations, but you can't see well enough inside the pitch-black room to tell if she's lying or not.

Before Claire keeps going, though, you add, "Wait. How do we know that you aren't setting the wall switch to shrink instead of grow?"

"Well, there really isn't. We don't label the switches, trying to make them obvious to everybody. But you'll have to trust me. We really do want the best for you, but Mr. Harrington can't keep working on this great new machine if you tell people about it. All his hard work will go down the drain, you know?"

You gulp and wipe away the sweat on your forehead. You gaze into the room once more, but still see nothing.

After a moment, you finally nod.

Claire follows the secretary closely, and they both watch her back as closely as they can in the dark room. However, the secretary stops a few steps in and talks to them again.
