Here you were, at home, but far from safe. You were hidden inside of a bowl of snacks, presumably to be eaten by your mom and Claire. It was hard to believe everything that was going on. And did they really have no idea that you were in this situation?

You couldn't think of any good reasons why they would be doing this if they DID know, except for a cruel prank. But accepting that just made you more fearful, since it meant they were unaware that they were going to eat you.

Claire brought the large bowl into the living room, placing it on the coffee table. The TV was on and your mom walked in behind Claire with pop.

But the worst of it was that three of Claire's friends were sitting right behind you on the couch.

It was still unbelievable: You were here in the snack bowl in front of your mom, sister, and sister's friends. They'd already began to dig in with their painted nails, tossing food into their mouths and laughing.

"Claire," your mom said as she sat down. "Turn off the light when you come back in here."

Claire did so and took her seat. You then realized that with the light off, there would be no distinction between you and food to the hungry girls. All five hands were now plunging all around you, and the sound of crunching food sounded throughout the room against the sound of the TV. You needed to move fast, or you'd be just another snack to one of them.
144.title: She opens the bag and pours it into a large bow...

1441.content:
You went to your left, feeling it was definitely your best option since the mix was getting smaller in the other directions. However, with your back turned, you were completely caught off-guard when four fingers picked you up and lifted you from the bowl.

"What's the name of this movie?" Claire asked as she placed more of the mix into her mouth.

"Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves," one of her friends answered.

"Those poor men are going to be eaten!" your mom commented.

The fingers that held you moved in your mom's direction, but the only way you knew that was because you could see Claire and her friends getting farther away from you. The dark room suddenly got even darker when you were placed into her mouth, which quickly welcome you to your new home. Your mom's moist tongue carelessly tossed her own son between her teeth, where she chewed you apart and swallowed before getting more.

"Mmm! What did you put in this?" she asked Claire as your remains travelled to her stomach.

"Nothing new, Mom."

"Hey, have you gotten any word yet from your brother? He wasn't here for kindergarten this morning when I ate breakfast."

Claire laughed and grinded more trail mix between her teeth. "Nope, and I don't know where Mr. Transfer is either."
1441.title: Go left

choices: Jump off the table to the wooden floor below
Jump off the table into Claire's shoes, which sit next to her feet
1442.content:
Avoiding the hungry group of girls, you almost HAD to go right. You quickly scrambled across the surface of the mix, narrowly evading one of Claire's friend's hand as it plunged down beside you. You then leaped to the side of the bowl, grabbing the lip and jumping over as soon as you could. You crashed into the glass surface of the coffee table, making a little bit louder of a sound than you'd wanted, though. Looking up, you saw that Claire was looking down at you. In her eyes, though, she didn't see her shrunken brother. She saw a raisin that had fallen onto the table from someone's grasp.

Her hand opened and extended towards you, intent on making you Claire's stomach's next little joy. You had to act fast, or you'd definitely fulfill that fate.
1442.title: Go right

14421.content:
You scrambled to escape and jumped off the table to fall to the floor. But, you immediately realized that was a mistake. Claire had been watching the entire time, realizing that you were more than just an innocent raisin. Unfortunately, as most people would react in this situation with the limited light, she mistook you for an insect. The pain you felt at striking the ground immobilized you for a moment, too. The fall had sent a shock throughout your body, but you didn't seem to have broken any bones.

Unfortunately for you, that was Claire's new job, not the floor's.

You saw her small foot leave the floor nearby. She was wearing white no-show socks, types that she loved to wear. Now she was going to wear you, as well, though. She dropped the sole of her foot over you, instantly smashing most of your body, and then wiped you across the floor until your entire body was spread from her sole to her toes. Claire didn't seem to mind the stain you created on her socks, because she relaxed afterwards and even sat on her feet later. When the time came to wash her clothes, though, your mom finally noticed your destroyed body on the bottom of her socks. However, she simply tossed them into the wash; you were too indiscernible from Claire's crushing and walking.
14421.title: Jump off the table to the wooden floor below

14422.content:
You hop into one of her shoes, somehow thinking it was your best bet. She doesn't see you, though, so you're alright.

Inside of her low-tops, you aren't really surprised to discover that her shoes don't smell bad. You already know how obsessive Claire is about being clean. She wouldn't let anything, especially not her feet or shoes, stink. However, now that you're stuck in your sister's shoe, you can't really do much except wait for her to put them back on. So, to prepare yourself for that impending event, you decide to head to one end of the shoe.
14422.title: Jump off the table into Claire's shoes, whi...

choices: You crawl under the sole of her white socked foot
144221.content:
You decide to hide in the heel section of your sister's sneaker because this way, when she goes to slide her foot in, you can jump up and down and she will see you in her shoe. Thus, you prevent yourself from becoming your 16 year old sister's insole for the night.

A couple hours go by and you're getting tired of inhaling the stench of your siblings feet; even though it doesn't smell bad, there's a mixture of perfume and feet in the air. You could hear the girls gossiping and giggling and enjoying their snack while you sat in an old shoe your sister had bought on Black Friday.

Finally, you hear the words you've been dying to hear.

"OK girls, I'll go get ready and get my shoes on."

Loud Thunderous footsteps begin to get closer to your position and you look up to see your titanic teenage sister ready to put her shoes and you on. Waving your arms like mad, you're hopeful to be found. That is, until Claire slips her foot into her low tops in the blink of an eye and you're crushed underneath her white socked heel. The pain of being crushed underneath your sis's full weight is unimaginable and you scream in pain. She lifts her foot up for one second and you see a space under her comfy arch that you can rest under without being flattened like a pancake. But the question is: do you have the energy to make it in time, or will Claire's heel get a new squish toy?
144221.title: The Heel of Claire's Shoe

1442212.content:
You try to crawl to the safety of your sisters arch, but your body is so badly beaten up that you cant even move from your spot in the heel section of her shoe. you roll over onto your back and look up at the giant white socked heel of your sister thats about to crush you into oblivion.

"Is this what my life is reduced to? Becoming the prisoner of my sisters sneaker and then crushed flat underneath her massive sole? I shouldve stayed on the table and risked getting eaten alive by my mom and sisters friends."

You would've dwelled on your past mistakes more, but the next second your sisters foot slams down into her insole and gets it right where she wants it in a comfortable spot. you were killed instantly when Claire's foot smushed you into a bloody spot on her heel. She gets up and continues doing whatever Lizzie asked her to do while your life has ended and she continues hers, with her brothers remains being trampled under her foot every day.

For years Claire wore those shoes because she felt a special bond between them and her feet. If only she knew the tragic fate that happened to you and the shrunken tragedy that caused your last place of living to be the home for her feet during her high school years.
1442212.title: Crushed Underneath the Bottom of a Teenage Girl

144222.content:
You head to the toe of the shoe, where you feel you have a better chance of surviving. From there, you wait.

After an hour or two, you hear the TV turn off. Claire's friends all say goodbye and make their way out, and the shoe that you're in is finally moved. The toes of a foot enter the shoe and then slip down towards you. Surprisingly, they actually touch you and cause the lower half of your body to fall underneath them. Your face is plunged into the front of the toes.

But, something's not right. Claire was wearing white socks; this foot is in black ones. Either she'd changed her socks for some reason, or somebody had accidentally taken Claire's shoes.

"Bye, Claire!" you hear above you as the foot travels. You remember it as the voice of Lizzie, Claire's blonde-haired guest. Apparently, neither of them had realized that she'd accidentally taken the wrong shoes.

You hear Lizzie enter her car, then feel the pressure of her toes on your legs as she presses her foot against the gas. She starts the engine up and begins driving, pressing more upon your lower half.

She moves her foot to the brakes as she nears a corner, then returns it to the gas. However, this time she begins pushing even harder on the gas, and puts a lot more weight on your legs.

Her car accelerates loudly and roars off, apparently down the highway near your house. As the pressure on you from her foot builds, though, you realize that the Interstate is nearby. Worry fills your thoughts as you start to feel this was a bad idea after all.

Lizzie moves you over to the brakes and presses down, then she turns the car onto the Interstate. However, she tries to be gutsy and pull ahead of a nearby semi-truck, when she should wait. However, there is a line of cars beyond it, so she slams down as hard as she can on the gas. Without warning, your legs are reduced to pancake form underneath her toes, sending your own blood rushing down her foot. She feels its moisture through her thin socks, and wiggles her toes a little, dropping the rest of your immobilized body beneath her foot completely. With the pressure of her foot against the gas pedal, your upper half is slowly smashed into the sole of her foot, ending your painful experience for good.

Spoiler?

She notices the feeling you make after being crushed, but she forgets about you by the time she gets home because her socks have dried.
144222.title: The toe

14423.content:
Unfortunately, you didn't really have a choice. You didn't really think that you did, did you?

Your sister's soft hand enveloped you and lifted you back upwards to her mouth. Her stomach growled loudly, stopping her hand just in front of her mouth for a moment.

"Hold your horses, Tummy," Claire said. Your body went numb as you watched her lips and tongue move to form those words.

Then, you were pushed into your sister's mouth in order to quiet her complaining stomach. She wasted no time even chewing you, she just grabbed a quick taste and swallowed.

Now, with something to work on for a while, her stomach stopped whining. However, you only took a minute or two to dissolve, at which point her stomach grumbled again for more food. Poor you, you weren't even given a respectable funeral, just eaten and made into more nutrition for your own sister.
14423.title: Not fast enough!

1443.content:
You went the only way possible to avoid the incoming fingers: backwards. You had trouble managing your way to the edge of the bowl, tripping over a pretzel. When you got back up though, your left leg sunk between some candy and raisins. You'd made a mistake, as Claire's blonde-haired friend Lizzie was over you in an instant. She'd spotted your movement in the bowl, unfortunately, and stood up to see better.

"Ew! There's a bug in the trail mix!" she exclaimed.

She obviously couldn't see you that well, but she already had her mind set to destroy you. Because you were trapped and unable to move, her fingers easily caught you. She then began pinching, very hard in fact, until your body was smooshed between them. She then rubbed her fingers together until you were mush and wiped you on the couch.

"It's okay, all taken care of," she assured the rest as she sat back down. The others frowned, but gave it little thought before returning their attentions to the TV.
1443.title: Go backwards

choices: Hide in the towel to your left
Hide in the towel to your right
145.content: When she enters her room, she places the bag of candy on her dresser and goes into her bathroom. Hearing the water running, you immediately start to manage your escape. You tear a hole big enough for you to escape the package and then squirm out onto the dresser's top. You hear the water turn off, which means that she might be coming back. You need to hide, but obviously not back in the bag of candy. However, your only other options are to hide in one of the two folded towels nearby or come out into the open and get your sister's attention. You could jump off the dresser, but that would spell almost certain death. Or, if neither of those sound good, you COULD go back into your former prison.
145.title: Claire heads to her bedroom with the candy in h...

1451.content: You leap into the folds of the towel on your left. You hide just in time to avoid being seen by Claire. However, it seems that it wouldn't have mattered which towel you'd selected, because she picks both of them up and heads into the bathroom again. You struggle, but hold on as she carries you in the towel. She places you down on the counter, but then puts her make-up bag right on top of where you are, pinning you down. You have no choice but to stay still as your sister takes a shower. In the mean time, you wonder how good of a decision it was to hide in a towel when you know that your sister takes five hundred showers a day.
1451.title: Hide in the towel to your left

14511.content: After an eternity of showering, Claire turns off the water and emerges. She then pushes the make-up bag off of the towel you're in, but unfolds it and drops it to the floor. She moves her feet onto it, nearly crushing you in the act. She begins moving around a lot on the towel, drying off with the other one, and you realize that you might be safer moving rather than staying stationary.
14511.title: Half an hour later...

145111.content:
You move to your left, narrowly avoiding being smothered under your sister's newly cleaned foot. You then take off, but have to turn because you're headed towards the wall of the shower. Unfortunately, before you can get off the towel, Claire unknowingly turns and places her foot over you. You fall on your face underneath the sole of her foot, but then you're pressed hard into the tile floor and towel when she shifts her weight over to that foot. Unfortunately, you are splattered like mud under her foot, which spreads your body across it.

"Huh?" she says, noticing the feeling. She looks at her foot and sees the stain that you've made on it, but she'd taken out her contacts before so she had no idea she had just stepped on her brother. Instead, she moans and steps back into the shower. After turning on the water, she scrubs her foot squeaky clean until not a trace of you remains on it, then smiles contently and steps back out.
145111.title: Move left

145112.content:
You move to your right, but suddenly see a shadow upon you. Before you can act, your sister's foot falls over you as she moves around. Luckily for you, though, you fall between her big and second toe. The bad part is that you are literally carried this way as she dresses and leaves the bathroom.

Claire then sits down on her bed, putting her bare feet up with her. She blindly looks around for a bag on her end table, unable to see very well since she's already taken out her contacts for then night. However, she grabs the bag and pulls out a container of magenta-colored nail polish from within it.

Back to you, you'd been trying to get away the moment that she'd sat down. Unfortunately, you'd only just popped out from between her toes to land on top of her big toe when the nail polish came down. You were smothered by your very near-sighted sister, pushed around and coated with polish until you blended into her nail. She then continued coloring her nails, but you discovered that you could not move underneath the thick polish she'd put upon you. And when she blew on her toes to dry them quicker, your situation only became more uncontrollable. You couldn't move even slightly, so the possibility of escaping was absolutely nonexistent. After her nails dried, she talked on the phone for a while and then went under the covers. She turned off the light and went to bed, unaware that her own brother was on her polished toenail.

You remain glued to her horrrid toe
14511211.content: Oh crap! She puts on her old Converse sockless! She goes to school putting you in a dark, sweaty, rancid hell. She eventually goes to gym class and starts running making your experience all the more miserable. Eventually, you feel her rubbing stop. She takes her shoes off and...

She then enters the shower, and you discover that you must wait for her to finish before you can even do anything.

14521.content: Claire steps out after WAY too long in the shower, and uses the first towel as a floormat for her feet. Then, she gathers the towel that you're in and unfolds it. You instinctively hold on to avoid falling to your death, and then Claire wraps the towel around her wet, brown hair. Now inbetween your sister's hair and the towel, your nose is filled with the aroma of warm, melted chocolate. She finishes up her nightly routine before returning to her room. She sits on her bed, her hair still wrapped, and begins polishing her toenails. After that is done, she pulls the towel from her hair, sending you loose. But, do you fall forward or backwards?

choices: Climb up to her ear and whisper for help
Crawl out from under the blankets
145211.content: You drop forward, sending you down in front of her, down to the bed below. You then watch as Claire leans forward, tossing the towel into her hamper, only to sit back down directly on top of you. She has gray sweats on, her normal pajama pants. Underneath them you lay pinned down as she talks needlessly on the phone for at least the next hour. However, she eventually decides to call it a night, at which point you are only momentarily freed before finding yourself hidden beside her underneath her blankets. The lights went out and then you had a decision to make.
145211.title: Forward

145212.content: You fall backwards, sending you spiraling to her pillow below. And just as you land, she drops her chocolate-scented head of hair back on top of you before turning out the light. With that, you find yourself pinned down underneath Claire's hair for the night. You decide to at least make the most of it after a while, and enjoy the warmth it provides you as you fall asleep.
145212.title: Backward

choices: Jump off the dresser and pray
Hide back inside the package of candy
Stand out in the open to become noticed
1453.title: More choices...

The fall finds you in a discarded bra.
14531.content: Well, this was quite a quandary, now wasn't it? With the surreal state you were in influencing your every move, it didn't even strike you as odd that the prospect of taking a leap of faith off of the dresser wasn't very daunting. You understood that this was a dire circumstance, and that it called for drastic measureslike the ones you had been contemplating, but was it anything short of suicide to just jump off Claire's dresser and hope you landed somewhere soft enough to break your fall, and not just break you? There was no time to hesitate, really, but there was also nowhere on the surface to hide, aside from your former prison. So, without so much as peering over the edge, you inhale deeply and run to the edge of the dresser, feeling no pangs of remorse as you leap off into thin, unsupporting air.

145311.title: You land, with minor injuries, in a pile of clo...

Then after thinking, she reaches down and grabs . . .

She picks you up and drops you in between her big tits. She pushes them together.

Unfortunately, she liked to tell you what happened when she did this. She would push her boobs together like this and then the next part came, the foot. As expected she then took you out and put you on the end of her bed. She then put her big clean foot on you. "How do you like my foot, I just washed it, doesn't it smell clean?" 145322.content:
She grabbed a red D&D and puts it on her pillow.
"Get ready, my slave. You are about to enjoy my giant butt, a pleasure few will know." Claire then sits on the candy and rubs her butt. When she lifts it up, all that is left of the candy is broken pieces. She then goes for another piece and crushes it with her foot. You try to run, but you fall down on her blanket. She grabs you and pulls you up to her face.
"I hope you enjoy my stomach little guy, because that is where you are going." She opens her big mouth and proceeds to put you in. You start to scream, when . . .
145322.title: Claire plays with her "slaves"

14533.content:
Without any time left to think, you decide to try and get Claire's attention and hope for the best. Standing out in the open, you start waving your arms and yelling out.

"Claire! Down here!"

You immediately notice your sister's eyes tracing the sound of your voice, and she practically falls over backwards when she sees you in your diminutive new size. Leaning in to get a closer look at you, she gasps in shock.

"Bro? Is that really you?!"

"Yeah Claire, it's me! Please, you have to help me!"

"Hold on a second, bro! How the heck did you get so tiny?! You're like the size of a little piece of candy!"

"How I got small isn't important, sis! Please! I need your help!"

"Hmmm... I don't know about that, bro... I think that it might be fun to keep you as a toy now that you're so tiny!"

"WHAT?! No! Please Claire, don't do anything like that! We're still family, right?"

"Well... I guess you have a point there... Hmmm... What to do, what to do..."

Claire then starts thinking about what to do with her now-tiny brother. After a bit of thought, she speaks to you again.

"Alright bro, I've decided what I'm gonna do with you now! I'm gonna....."
14533.title: Your sister: Savior or Destroyer?

choices: Back at your new high school
In a very rich and spoiled little girl's house
15.content: You were actually not anybody's snack, yet. Instead, you were really inside of a vending machine, sitting behind one other bag of D&D's, just waiting to be purchased and devoured. However, you could only guess where this vending machine might be...
15.title: Nobody...Yet.

151.content:
"Can we go get something to eat?" a bunch of girls asked their teacher in a classroom nearby. The teacher, an old, frail woman, nodded without any eye contact, too involved in her book to care.

The group headed straight to the area of the school which housed its only vending machines. There was one selling strictly food and another selling only drinks. Dollar bills were uncrumpled and straightened out in the girls' hands, and then they entered the machines as the girls made their selections.

There were a lot of voices outside that you could hear. As you realized your bag was moving and you were being purchased, you couldn't discern who was buying you. Not that it would've mattered, since you didn't know any of the girls outside.

A peppy senior, a fit blonde with a pretty face and confident eyes, held you within her hand as she brought you back with her to class. Her fingernails were altermately painted the orange and yellow colors of Reese's Pieces, ironically enough. She had a cheerful laugh, bright smile, and a bounce in her step as she walked back with her friends.

"Have you guys tried this new pop?" one girl, a cheerleader, asked. "It's called Cherry Cascade."

"Nope," another responded. "You shouldn't be drinking that anyway! It's bad for your figure, Jess!"

"Elise! You've had Cherry Cascade before, haven't you?" Jess asked your new owner.

"Nope never," she answered as she popped a D&D between her lips. "Doesn't Orlando Bloom drink that stuff?"

"I don't know, does he?"

"Yeah!" another girl pops in. "You know, you know, the commercial that goes, "Cherrrrryyyyy Cassssscaaaaadeeee," and then Orlando Bloom sighs! That one!"

"Oh yeah!" Elise exclaims. "I LOVE Cherry Cascade!"

Jess looks at her and frowns, but a mischievous glance out of the side of Elise's eyes turns Jess's lips back around. They both smile as they enter the classroom again.

As everyone sits back down, you realize that your time is coming. Elise's fingers are getting closer and closer to you. You'd been trying your best to escape her grasp, but you knew your time was coming.

Unfortunately, she was ready to finish her breakfast snack and flipped the bag upside down above her open mouth. You and the last three D&Ds fell to her smooth tongue, but you were propelled further on, sliding down into her throat, where she was forced to swallow you whole.

With a choke and a hard cough, Elise caught the attention of her class. She grabbed her throat with one hand, but smile with one closed eye at her classmates reassuringly.

"It's okay, just a tricky piece."
151.title: Back at your new high school

1512.content:
"Hmm, this is odd," a doctor commented as he looked at an X-ray. A nearby nurse came over and looked at it over his shoulder.

"What are you looking at?" she asked.

"Look here," he said, pointing to a very detailed white dot in the middle of empty space on an X-ray of someone's midsection. "What does that look like to you.. at least, what does it remind you of?"

"It looks like a full skeleton, like a human's," she responded. "But that's not possible, is it? I mean, do you think she ate a bug or something?"

"Well, it's in her stomach, but the details..." he inspects the X-ray very closely. "It just looks so much like a human skeleton. I can't think of anything else it might be, even at that size."

"Who's the patient?" the nurse asked, looking at a nearby file.

"Elise Browder. She's here for pain in her ribs."

"And you found out that she's also swallowed a fully-developed, mini human, huh?"

The doctor frowns at the X-ray, unbelieving, and then heads into a nearby room. Inside, Elise and her mother sit patiently waiting.

"Well, Elise, you sure do have a small fracture in one of your ribs, but it's very minor and should heal up just fine. However, we noticed something... unusual, on your X-ray. Take a look," he says, showing the women the picture and pointing to the white spot.

"What is it?" Elise asks.

"It looks like a skeleton," her mom comments, meeting curious eyes with her daughter.

"Yeah, it appears to be a full skeleton, and it's in your stomach," he reports. "We'll need to remove it from there so it doesn't cause any future problems for you."

"Surgery?"

"Yeah," the doctor tells them. "But we need to do it immediately. We can't wait until it becomes a problem. I'm going to find an available surgeon, and then we'll get started, it that's alright with you."
1512.title: Five hours later...

15121.content:
You are fast asleep when the surgeon removes you from Elise's stomach. Caught within the grip of his forceps, you are moved towards a nearby nurse, who holds a small baby-food jar open for you to be placed in. The lid is tightened over you, but has airholes inside of it. The nurse leaves the room with you, leaving the surgeon to finish his job.

You wake up sometime later, but are no longer in the jar. You find yourself in a plastic bag, once again between the fingers of Elise. You wonder what's going on, but have no idea that Elise had asked to see what was in her stomach. When they had seen you, Elise's mother told them that you were her nephew, handing you over to her daughter when the hospital "returned" you to them.

"Don't tell anyone about your new pet," she told Elise. "Especially not your siblings."

Later, you officially met your new owner. She released you onto her bed, laying right next to you with a relaxed smile on her face.

"Hello," she said to you. "What's your name?"
15121.title: Elise undergoes surgery...

choices: So hungry... Need to find food!
You can hear her coming back - Hide!
151211.content:
"Oh," she said. "Okay, but I'm going to give you a nickname, alright? I'm gonna call you 'Tiny' from now on."

"You're not going to help me?" you asked, hope shot down.

"Help you how?"

"You know, return to normal size. I'm not supposed to be this way! I was -"

"Shh," she told you, placing her finger onto you and flattening you onto your back. "I'm gonna take care of you!"

"I have family!" you protested beneath her soft, cold finger.

"Yeah, me. I'm your new sister."

Elise's phone suddenly goes off, and she lays off you to answer it. After hearing who was calling, she picks you up and places you in her jewelry box, then leaves the room to talk to her friend. As soon as the door closes, you escape your prison and fall down to the floor. You take quite a fall, but recover after a minute and look around.

You need to decide what to do now.
151211.title: You tell her your name

1512112.content:
You hear footsteps returning towards the room... probably Elise's!

Where do you hide?
1512112.title: You can hear her coming back - Hide!

choices: Sneak past Elise's foot and make it through
Sneak past Elise's foot but she notices you
15121121.content:
"Okay, I'll talk to you later. Bye."

Elise comes back into the room and sits down on the bed. She notices right away that you're missing, but doesn't seem upset.

"Thank goodness..."

You say to yourself... But then your stomach growled... Being out cold for who knows how long left you rather hungry with a dry throat as well...
1533.title: Either way, they didn't select the D&D's

choices: The Buyer Opens The Pack Now
The Buyer Waits To Open The Pack
15331.content: You may have thought you were safe for the time being... But after you heard someone taking the canned drink, you heard the sounds of money being put in, and buttons being pressed again... But this time... They were much closer... You felt the worled around you, or more like the packaging around you, begin to shake. And before you knew what was happening, you felt the packaging you were in begin to freefall! You had been bought in a small pack of the candies! And luckily for you, the pack landed in the hands of the buyer! If it had hit the hard metal floor, you might've gone splat... But thinking about it... This wasn't much better really...
15331.title: You Hear The Buttons Again... But Closer...

15333.content:
Thinking quickly, you begin flailing around, trying to rip open the paper packaging trapping you with the candy! It certainly took some time, but you managed to make a small hole in the pack... And with some effort, you tore it big enough for your big escape! But now something bad's just started happening... You heard the sound of a dollar bill being inserted, and buttons being pressed! And then the pack started to be pushed by the maching! But with a perfectly timed leap, you managed to get out, and grab onto a pack of gummy worms before the torn pack of D&Ds plummeted to the bottom of the machine! But do to the tear, all the candy fell out! You were able to get a peek at the person who had made the purchase...

It was your little sister Macey! She was only eleven with shoulder-length blonde hair, and purple eyes... She had slightly tan skin, and was pretty much flat in the way of assets... She stood just under four feet, and was dressed in her Elementary school uniform... Even had a little name tag with her name on it... She was also wearing her black flip-flops... You didn't know this about her, but she was actually bullied at school, and too afraid to tell her family about it... Judjing by her expression she was _______ as to why all the candy spilled out!
15333.title: You Try To Escape The Machine

choices: No, there is too much candy.
154.content:
You look around. Everything is fancy.
"I'm getting hungry, I need candy!" Someone yells.
In front of you is a small girl. She had blond hair and blue eyes. She had bright shiny teeth. She was looking right at you.
"You will soon be my snack."
"Why did you shrink me?" You ask.
"My name is Sophia, and you look tasty."
She hit the button and candy starts moving. They fall out through the little door.
"This will be you soon" she put a piece of candy and crushed it in her teeth. She walked away through a door.
"I need to get out of here." You say.
Can you get out?
154.title: Sophia, the rich giantess

choices: Somehow, yes! She is startled by something and drops you onto her carpet.
1541.content:
You wriggle around in the bag, trying to get yourself free from your surroundings of large, circular candies, but it's ultimately fruitless. You suddenly stop as you feel the bag starting to shift forward as it is ejected from the vending machine, before crashing far down to the bottom of the machine. You collapse, completely surrounded in a sea of edible goodies, before you feel a large press to your back and the bag is lifted up roughly and sloppily. Sophia has returned, looking for her candy.

You look up as the top of the bag is ripped off, allowing you to view the rich young giantess, her long locks of blonde hair resting on the forefront of her shoulders and her toungue licking her lips, showing blatant hunger.

She, not wasting a second, shoves her young hand into the bag, removing you and 4 other pieces before holding out her palm in front of her face, staring directly at you. Throwing caution to the wind, you angrily cry out to her.

"Hey, you can't do this! Lemme go!!"

She frowns, not to show guilt or remorse but to show pity for her soon-to-be snack.

"Ah, no! That'd be good for you, but you're tiny and I'm big, and I'm hungry and in need of a tasty snack, and you look like a tasty snack! If anything, you should be grateful that a big princess like me thinks an teenie weenie bug like you is deserving of being her candy!"

With that said, she raises her palm once again and clumps her hand together, holding her wad of candy above her big, open mouth, waiting to be eaten.

"Have a safe trip to my tummy, little one!"

This should be the end for you. Can your dumb luck save you from this situation?
1541.title: Vended

15411.content:
Of course not.

She lets go, sending you and the four candies falling down into her gaping maw. All 5, yourself included, fell flat onto her gigantic salivating tongue, before the tongue began to shuffle the candies around her mouth as she chewed the foods into small pieces. You flew around her mouth, being slammed into candy often, causing your body to begin aching, until finally you and the rest of Sophia's snacks fell flat on her tongue. You began to get shocked as you felt the tongue below you begin to twitch, and you desperately paced around a candy and tried to cling on to one of her teeth. However, this action was ultimately useless as her tongue finally flicked upwards, slapping you off of the tooth and flying into the air along with the candy, about to crash down the young rich girl's throat. You screamed, but it did nothing as you crashed downwards and was flung into the deep, dark abyss of Sophia's gullet.

The little girl burped as she finished shoveling candies into her mouth. She groaned and rested her head on the pillow.

"Waaaahh... my tummy huuuurts.. I'm never gonna eat a tiny man ever again.."

The giant little rich girl's belly ache was the last thing you ever contributed to in the world.
15411.title: Of course not, you're candy.

choices: "Alright" and she gets you out to hide
Sophia walks in and yells at her mom
1543.content:
An older woman just then enters. She also has blond hair and blue eyes. She came up to the machine.
"Would you like to be mine?" She asks.
"Who are you?" You question. She smiles.
"I am Sophia's mother, and I can help you, but only if you listen." You think about this for a minute.
1543.title: Someone else comes in.

15431.content:
“Alright” you say unsure of yourself.

“Ok sweetie, hold on” she says in a kind, non-threatening tone.

Sophia’s mom pushes the button and you fall through the door. Quickly Sophia’s mom scoops you up in her hand and walks out of her daughter’s room. Looking between her closed fingers you see just how huge the house is. You can’t help but wonder what Sophia’s mom wants with you. She said she could help you but she also asked you if you wanted to be hers. That made you wonder a bit.

Sophia’s mom carried you in her closed hand all you could do is wonder what her intentions were. Soon she open up her hand and right away you realized what was going on. Sophia’s mom was going to...
15431.title: Saved

choices: Dip yourself under the milk to try and soak the piece you're attached to
155.content:
Ha! You had thought you were in a vending machine, for some reason. Plus, why were you thinking that you were really in a bag of D&D's?

When you wake up, it doesn't take you long to realize where you really are. And a few feet away from you, little do you know, a gorgeous blonde woman stares right at the box that contains you.

"Hmmm... 'This box of D&D's brand cereal contains a mystery prize!'" she reads off the box. "I wonder what that could be?"

You can slightly hear the voice from inside, but when she picks up the box, you find yourself shuffled around inside as she throws you into her shopping cart. You gulp hard, wondering if this was really the way your life would end... as a part of someone's breakfast.

-------The next morning-------

Stacy, the woman who'd purchased the cereal for her mystery prize, entered the kitchen as you were waking up. She yawned and grabbed the box from the pantry, giving you a little wake-up shake as she began to pour you into her bowl. You start to shout out to get her attention, but you find that she can't even hear your small voice. And, to make things worse, your body is stuck to a piece of cereal!!

As she digs around in the box, Stacy says, "I wonder where my prize is at?"

She finds nothing in the box after a moment, so she sits down and dips her spoon into the bowl. You watch the spoon lift up towards her mouth, full of cereal, and disappear within. Then, you heard the frightening sound of her teeth chomping that cereal into thousands of pieces. Your heart began to race as her spoon returned, and when the spoon began to lift you up from the bowl, your stomach flipped over inside of you. However, you fell from the spoon and avoided sure death in being devoured by this woman Stacy.

But, if you didn't do something right away, she was eventually going to down you!
155.title: Vending machine? Wishful thinking!

choices: I miss her lip, and head to my fate
1551.content:
Thinking tactfully, you flip your piece of cereal over to unstick yourself. While you nearly drown in the process, you manage to get unstuck just in time to navigate away from the mass of cereal that Stacy scooped into her mouth, and hop back into the bowl.
You swim your way over to the side, but realise that the milk is too low at this point to allow you to climb out. Stacy finishes the last few pieces of cereal, then begins to lift the bowl up to her face. She opens her mouth, and begins to tilt the bowl so the milk flows down her throat.

You feel yourself being pulled by the current towards the black abyss. You aim for the corner of her mouth, hoping to avoid a fate inside of the giant woman.
1551.title: Let's Try the Ol' Flipperoo!

choices: I'll make the trek to the bag
I'll wait for her to come to me
15511.content:
You manage to manoeuvre perfectly, and land right on the corner of Stacy's lip. She moves her hand to rub you off, and you use the opportunity to hitch a ride down to the counter top. Stacy pushes her stool in and leaves the kitchen after placing her dishes in the sink. After watching her go about her business in the room, you decide that you need to take action. You can hear feet coming down the stairs, and are able to ascertain that it is one of Stacy's daughters. She probably goes to your new school, so catching a ride on her would bring you one step closer to getting back to normal.

Her bag is near the front door, and it's safe to say she'll be taking it with her to school. On the other hand, you might not make it all the way to the front door in time, so a more passive approach might be considerably wiser, and more convenient.
15511.title: Escaping Fate

15512.content:
There is no escaping the pull of the current, as you are sucked into Stacy's gaping maw. You enter and are immediately overtaken by the smell of morning breath and milk. The flow continues to drag you down towards her throat, and almost like a water slide, you take a steep drop into her stomach.

You land with a splash in the milk that has cummulated within Stacy's belly. The smell becomes significantly stronger, as the milk-acid mixture produces the unpleasant odour of spoiled milk. The stomach, recognising the ease of which the cereal breaks down, expedites the process of digestion and progresses onward toward the next stage. You feel the levels of liquid slowly drop, but can't see anything. You can only assume that the contents of Stacy's stomach are flowing onward into the small intestine, and you are about to follow suit.

Suddenly, you feel a strong tug at your feet. You realise you are standing directly on top of the sphincter that leads to the intestine, and are being forced into the next stage. You are pulled down, and milk begins to cover your head.

You try to hold your breath. The seconds tick by, and your lungs burn for oxygen. You gasp for air, but find none. Everything fades, as you pepare to be unconciously assimilated into Stacy's body.
15512.title: It was nice knowing ya...

1552.content:
You continue your fruitless cries to Stacy. Some part of you is convinced that you'll get lucky, and this will work. Yet another part of you is curious. What was it like for those pieces of cereal she so easily chrushed? you unconciously wonder to yourself. Her mouth draws near, and you prepare your body. You see strands of saliva that cross from the roof of her mouth to her tongue, and the shattered remenants of cereal pieces that lie within the contours of her teeth. A shiver passes over you, knowing that your life is about to end in the same manner.

The final moment comes. Stacy shuts her mouth behind the spoon, and all light is removed from the prison that is Stacy's mouth. Her warm breath washes over you, as you take in the smell of her mouth. Your body becomes soaked in saliva, and you feel her tongue sample you, edging towards her teeth.

You feel a cold, stone-like tooth slide beneath you, and recognise that this is the end. Stacy's teeth come down hard and fast, amd she fails to notice you within the cruches of her breakfast.
1552.title: I'm Gonna Scream, and Shout, and Let it All Out

choices: I yell at the top of my lungs!
1553.content:
Suddenly, you hear the pounding of feet coming down the stairs. You can't teel who it is, but the person has stopped Stacy from eating you, for the mokent, unable to see any escape, you simply listen to the interaction between the two individuals.

"''Morning. Kelley," Stacy begins, "ready for another week of school?"

"Yeah," Kelly responds, "but it's not gonna be as fun as last week." She refers to the fieldtrip to the D&D's factory, the same fieldtrip that got you into your current predicament.

"Well, I bought some D&D's cereal, if that'll cheer you up. You can have my bowl, I need to finish getting ready for work." Stacy slides the bowl over to Kelley, then gets up to leave.

Kelley looks down at you, hungrily. You recognise her as one of the juniors at your school, at the age of 17. She has a round face, with a button nose, but certainly isn't fat, or even chubby, just built short. She manages to grab you in her first spoonnful, and lifts you to her mouth.

This is your last chance at survival. What do you do?
1553.title: Enter: Kelley

15532.content:
Perhaps it is the fear invoked by seeing a giant mouth looming over you. Perhaps it is the realisation of the hopelessness of your situation. Or perhaps you actually want to be eaten. Whatever the case may be, you find yourself unable to move. Saliva drips around you as your vessel is placed in her mouth. Her lips shut behind you, sealing all light from the cavern you now occupy. The cereal has become soggy, giving Kelley no reason to chew. The spoon slides from beneath you, as the motion of her retracting it and her mouth moving you towards her throat begins you on your journey. Head over heels, you tumble in the saliva-cereal-milk mixture towards her throat. Your size amounts to nothing, as you fall down her throat instead of actually being swalllowed. Only stands of saliva manage to slow your hellish decent, as you land in her stomach.

The teenager's stomach is in overdrive, as it gladly accepts its first meal since the previous night. Digestive juices begin mixing with the cocktail of terror you traveled with, and the effects are noticable. The soggy cereal bits become almost nothing, as their weakened states make their breakdowns much faster than yours will be. It takes several minutes before your skin starts to itch: a sign that the acids are begining to take effect. You continue to sit in darkness, as the movement of Kelley walking around and her stomach trying to break you down toss you to and fro. The itching intensifies, and your flesh begins to peel. The situation becomes utterly intoxicating, and only pain fills your senses as consciousness leaves your body.
15532.title: I'm frozen with fear...

info.brief_description: A school trip leaves you in the wildest situation of your life...**Sequel in the works!**
info.description:
Short and simple, capisce?

I appreciate any and all adds, but I can't and won't promise any GP's or rewards.

In general, there are no rules here. That said, I may edit or delete added chapters. Don't take offense at this; I'm just maintaining quality.

If you have an idea for my story, but don't want to write out a chapter for it, e-mail me. I'll consider the idea, but I won't make any guarantees that it'll become exactly how you wanted, or that it'll even be used. I am very grateful for fresh ideas, though.

Finally, please rate and become a fan to provide me feedback. I will continue writing if I see response. Feel free to e-mail me for any reason, as well.
info.pretty_title: Your Life: Shrunken to a Snack
